section.name: Prerequisites
section.p:
Currently tested with the following dependencies:
Groovy 1.5.7 Download here
Maven 2.0.9 Download here
Ant 1.6.5 Download here
SVN Client (for example, TortoiseSVN for Windows)

p.section:
Before starting with Crank Codegen tool, you are required to install Crank dependencies first:
Check out sources from Crank SVN repository: # Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
svn checkout http://krank.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ krank-read-only Build and deploy Crank dependencies using Mavn2 and corresponding pom.xml file, as follows: mvn clean install
Please see the Related projects->Crank section
